overview: Ils tournent en rond is a reinterpretation of the painting Kermesse with Theater and Procession by Pieter Bruegel the Younger. After having erased digitally the characters present in the original painting, new characters were reanimated inside this medieval scene. Ludic and offbeat, characters (clones of Boris Labb√©!) continually replaying scenes from the original painting, locked in their endless cycles.
title: Ils tournent en rond
